Louisville_Jefferson_County.Humana Building:
The Humana Building, also known as the Humana Tower, is a 1985 skyscraper in downtown Louisville, Kentucky, located at 500 West Main Street and headquarters of the Humana Corporation.


== Description ==
The 26-story structure is headquarters of the Humana Corporation and known for its postmodern architecture.It was designed by Michael Graves. Construction began in October 1982 and was completed in May 1985.
